name: Pool Billiards Pro - Pool Game
description:
Pool Billiards is a suite of games featuring several variations of Pool, Billiards, Snooker, Crokinole and Carrom board games.
Welcome to the Pool Billiards game! This is the must have Pool game and it is totally FREE.
Game Features:
1. Very Realistic Pool, Billiard and Snooker Physics
2. 3D graphics ball animation
3. Touch control for moving the stick
4. Snooker challenge
5. Practice

If you have ever thought about playing billiards or Snooker on a real table, Pool Billiards is the perfect way to try a variety of games and pick your favorite.

How to play:
1) VS Mode: 8 Ball Pool and 9 Ball Pool
Play against the computer AI with standard 8 ball rules or 9 ball rules. Touch the screen to adjust the direction and drag down the power-up in the RIGHT to strike.

2) Arcade Mode: 60 Challenging Levels
You need to pocket all the balls on the table within the given number of cues. There is no time limit and rules for this mode but watch out you have only limited number of cues.

Thank you all for your comments, reviewers, feedbacks, suggestions and constructive criticism that have greatly helped shape and polish this game over time.
